get.summary: View a list of address data suggestions for given address data
get.description:
Returned address suggestions. 

If suggestionType is ZIPCODE: field zipCode required, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName 
If suggestionType is LOCALITY: field localityName required, field zipCode optional, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName 
If suggestionType is STREET: fields zipCode OR localityName(equal to municipalityName), streetName required, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName and streetName 
If suggestionType is HOUSE: fields zipCode, localityName(equal to municipalityName), streetName, houseQualifier required, suggests: all fields

parameters.name: houseQualifier
parameters.description: Full house number(should be filled for suggestion type: HOUSE)

parameters.name: localityName
parameters.description: Municipality(city) or DistributionArea(district) name(should be filled for suggestion type: LOCALITY, STREET, HOUSE)

parameters.name: streetName
parameters.description: Street name(should be filled for suggestion type: STREET, HOUSE)

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: Zip code(should be filled for suggestion type: ZIPCODE, STREET, HOUSE)

get.summary: View a list of address data suggestions for given address data
get.description:
Returned address suggestions. 

If suggestionType is ZIPCODE: field zipCode required, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName 
If suggestionType is LOCALITY: field localityName required, field zipCode optional, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName 
If suggestionType is STREET: fields zipCode OR localityName(equal to municipalityName), streetName required, suggests: zipCode, minicipalityName, distributionAreaName and streetName 
If suggestionType is HOUSE: fields zipCode, localityName(equal to municipalityName), streetName, houseNumber required, suggests: all fields

parameters.name: houseNumber
parameters.description: House number(should be filled for suggestion type: HOUSE)

parameters.name: houseNumberSupplement
parameters.description: House number supplement(should be filled for suggestion type: HOUSE, or could be empty if houseNumber is filled)

parameters.name: localityName
parameters.description: Municipality(city) or DistributionArea(district) name(should be filled for suggestion type: LOCALITY, STREET, HOUSE)

parameters.name: streetName
parameters.description: Street name(should be filled for suggestion type: STREET, HOUSE)

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: Zip code(should be filled for suggestion type: ZIPCODE, STREET, HOUSE)

get.summary: Find a list of zipcode and city(municipalityName) list by ONKZ and ASB
get.description: Returned list of unique pairs of zipcode and cities(municipalityNames). In case of nonvalid onkz/asb controller returns empty list

get.summary: View a list of address data suggestions for given address data

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address string, by wich suggestion will be done

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response filtering fields. Logic is not implemented yet, values are ignored
